events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to assist you throughout the process.
We conducted an initial screening interview to understand your background and technical expertise in software development.
Thank you for your insightful responses during the initial screening. We look forward to continuing with your interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with one of our senior software engineers next Tuesday at 10 AM.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding and problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your career aspirations and fit within our company culture.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed a great alignment with our values and working environment.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions regarding the onboarding process.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process began with an introduction to our team, tools, and company policies.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, welcoming you officially as part of our engineering department.
